job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: THIS IS AN INTERNSHIP ROLE!Who we areAt Paravijjyan we are working to build a platform that would help people do mindfulness practices whenever and wherever they want just by using their mobile phones. We have already AI recognition systems that would predict your accuracy while doing yoga better than a physical trainer that too at the comfort of your own home. We have several other features including Astrology , Meditation and diet recommendation(just by clicking a snap!).Qualifications:Strong hands-on development experience with Python.Experience working with Firebase.Experience with Tensorflow.Working knowledge of Git, Continuous Integration, and other supporting systemsAbility to work in an agile work environment where team members are remote.Â Nice to haveExperience using Posenet/BlazePose/similar models.Experience applying machine learning for Gesture and Real-time detection.Experience using Flutter.PerksLearn and work with like-minded peopleLetter of RecommendationOpportunity to turn Full time!
